globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'self'; img-src 'self' data: blob:; font-src 'self' data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' ws: wss: http://localhost:*; frame-src 'self' http://localhost:*;
